data.name: Beneath The Deep
data.detailed_description: Beneath The Deep is a single-player sci-fi horror game created by a small team of indie developers. After waking up from a coma, you find yourself displaced in a rundown government facility. This facility was built in the abyss of the ocean to secure itself from the outside world. The game puzzles you with missions of problem-solving and exploration with the added danger of merciless and brutal creatures. Surviving has always been a critical element of human nature but only a few can put up to the challenge that this game has to offer. Beneath The Deep takes inspiration from various other well-known titles in the horror and sci-fi genres.
data.about_the_game: Beneath The Deep is a single-player sci-fi horror game created by a small team of indie developers. After waking up from a coma, you find yourself displaced in a rundown government facility. This facility was built in the abyss of the ocean to secure itself from the outside world. The game puzzles you with missions of problem-solving and exploration with the added danger of merciless and brutal creatures. Surviving has always been a critical element of human nature but only a few can put up to the challenge that this game has to offer. Beneath The Deep takes inspiration from various other well-known titles in the horror and sci-fi genres.
data.short_description: Beneath The Deep is a Sci-Fi Horror game Inspired by the 80's retro style. It takes place deep beneath the sea in a Facility where human testing is done. Nightmarish Monsters lurk beneath the Deep

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: i5 6500, ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
